channel.title: Latest Traffic Information for England - All confirmed events, on the M4
channel.description: The latest traffic information for England's motorway and trunk routes provided by the Highways Agency.

image.title: Latest Traffic Information for England - All confirmed events, on the M4

item.author: ha_info@highways.gsi.gov.uk
item.title: M4 westbound between J12 and J13 | Westbound | Roadworks
item.description: On the M4 westbound between junctions J12 and J13, minor delays are possible due to roadworks closing one lane. Expect disruption until 6:00 am.

item.author: ha_info@highways.gsi.gov.uk
item.title: M4 eastbound between J12 and J11 | Eastbound | Roadworks
item.description: On the M4 eastbound between junctions J12 and J11, minor delays are possible due to roadworks closing one lane. Expect disruption until 6:00 am.

item.author: ha_info@highways.gsi.gov.uk
item.title: M4 westbound between J11 and J12 | Westbound | Roadworks
item.description: On the M4 westbound between junctions J11 and J12, minor delays are possible due to roadworks closing one lane. Expect disruption until 6:00 am.

item.author: ha_info@highways.gsi.gov.uk
item.title: M4 westbound within J14 | Westbound | Roadworks
item.description: On the M4 westbound at junction J14, minor delays are possible due to roadworks closing one lane. Expect disruption until 6:00 am.

item.author: ha_info@highways.gsi.gov.uk
item.title: M4 eastbound between J23 and J22 | Eastbound | Roadworks
item.description: On the M4 eastbound between junctions J23 and J22, there are currently delays of 10 mins due to roadworks closing two lanes. Expect disruption until 6:00 am.

item.author: ha_info@highways.gsi.gov.uk
item.title: M4 eastbound between J15 and J14 | Eastbound | Roadworks
item.description: On the M4 eastbound between junctions J15 and J14, there are currently delays of 10 mins due to roadworks . Expect disruption until 6:00 am on 23 December 2011.

item.author: ha_info@highways.gsi.gov.uk
item.title: M4 eastbound between J21 and J20 | Eastbound | Roadworks
item.description: On the M4 eastbound between junctions J22 and J20, expect delays of up to 10 mins at peak times due to roadworks closing two lanes, between 7 pm and 6 am, from 7 October 2011 to 10 October 2011.

item.author: ha_info@highways.gsi.gov.uk
item.title: M4 westbound at the Heston services slip road between J2 and J3 | Westbound | Roadworks
item.description: The M4 westbound entry slip from Heston Services will be closed due to roadworks, between 10 pm and 5 am, from 5 October 2011 to 7 October 2011.

item.author: ha_info@highways.gsi.gov.uk
item.title: M4 J4 westbound exit | Westbound | Roadworks
item.description: The M4 westbound exit slip at junction J4 will be closed due to roadworks, from 10 pm on 3 October 2011 to 5 am on 4 October 2011.

item.author: ha_info@highways.gsi.gov.uk
item.title: M4 J4 westbound access | Westbound | Roadworks
item.description: The M4 westbound entry slip at junction J4 will be closed due to roadworks, from 10 pm on 3 October 2011 to 5 am on 4 October 2011.

item.author: ha_info@highways.gsi.gov.uk
item.title: M4 westbound between J3 and J4 | Westbound | Roadworks
item.description: On the M4 westbound between junctions J3 and J4, expect delays of up to 10 mins at peak times due to roadworks closing two lanes, from 10 pm on 3 October 2011 to 5 am on 4 October 2011.

item.author: ha_info@highways.gsi.gov.uk
item.title: M4 J17 eastbound access | Eastbound | Roadworks
item.description: The M4 eastbound entry slip at junction J17 will be closed due to carriageway resurfacing, between 8 pm and 6 am, from 3 October 2011 to 8 October 2011.

item.author: ha_info@highways.gsi.gov.uk
item.title: M4 J17 westbound exit | Westbound | Roadworks
item.description: The M4 westbound exit slip at junction J17 will be closed due to carriageway resurfacing, between 8 pm and 6 am, from 3 October 2011 to 8 October 2011.

item.author: ha_info@highways.gsi.gov.uk
item.title: M4 eastbound within J10 before A329(M) westbound access | Eastbound | Roadworks
item.description: On the M4 eastbound at junction J10, minor delays are possible due to roadworks closing one lane. Expect disruption until 5:00 pm on 26 November 2011.
